name: Big Move Small Backpack
description:
Big Move Small Backpack is about finding a drawer of childhood artifacts on your last day in the country.

A first person game set in a place you can't quite remember at a time you'll never forget.

It's a sleepy summer morning in a provincial town skirting the Birmingham ring road. A bell rings out across the street for sunday service and drowns out the reassuring hum of the television. You squeeze Blue Bear tightly and thumb the remote as you try to ignore the surrounding chaos. It's moving day, again.

---

Art by Richard Tongeman
Code & Writing by Tony Jeffree
Music by Richard Campbell

---

Tools used:
INK
Fungus
Dotween

Asset Packs used:
Cartoon Furniture by Jesper Kondrup
Cartoon House by Kaos VR
